metadata.synopsis: After the goblin hunt celebration party, the Drow Commander Minthara has made arrangements to get intimate with the player at night.After the sex scene, Minthara becomes troubled. She realises that while she's with the player she cannot hear the voice of the Absolute... which is liberating, and disturbing. This, unknown to her, is because of the Astral Prism's influence.

17.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
17.text: You're here - good. Come with me.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scene starts at Player's bedroll, leads player to the altar of the AbsoluteNodeContext: An instruction delivered with a flirtatious smile

61.context: CinematicNodeContext: MTH walks the player up the alter of the Absolute, then turns, inviting them to lie upon itNodeContext: An instruction delivered with a flirtatious smile, domineering

18.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: MTH walks the player up the alter of the Absolute, then turns, inviting them to lie upon itNodeContext: An instruction delivered with a flirtatious smile, domineering

11.speaker: Player
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara snakes down the players chest while maintaining eye contact

35.speaker: Player
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara snakes down the players chest while maintaining eye contact

65.speaker: Narrator
65.text: *An image of her naked body against yours flashes into your mind.*
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara snakes down the players chest while maintaining eye contact

84.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
84.text: Do not speak. Just do as I say.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: I think we need to know each other a little better first.
76.context: NodeContext: smiling flirtatiously, totally in control of the situation

69.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
69.text: I have seen your mind - I know everything I need to know.
69.context: NodeContext: smiling flirtatiously, totally in control of the situation

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Is this a seduction or a sacrifice?
14.context: NodeContext: with a flirtatious smile, domineering

50.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
50.context: NodeContext: with a flirtatious smile, domineering

66.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara strokes the player's cheek, then gestues toward the alter and looks at the playerNodeContext: flirtatious and domineering

92.speaker: Player
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player lays themselves on the alter of the Absolute as Minthara watches

59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player lays themselves on the alter of the Absolute as Minthara watches

30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player lays themselves on the alter of the Absolute as Minthara watches

91.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
91.text: Your obedience will make this more enjoyable for both of us. Tell me what you want.
91.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara leans over top the player, lifting their head toward her ownNodeContext: flirtatious, domineering

97.speaker: Player
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara grabs the player and pull them in for a kiss before a fade a blackNodeContext: with a smile, final line before sex scene

9.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara grabs the player and pull them in for a kiss before a fade a blackNodeContext: with a smile, final line before sex scene

104.speaker: Narrator
104.text: *As your bodies lock together, so do your minds. Her whole being is laid bare before you.*
104.context:
CinematicNodeContext: --fade in--
Minthara and the player embrace, naked.
The player's hand drifts over the small of Minthara's back. Minthara grabs it, pulling it under.
--fade out--

40.text: *As your bodies lock together, so do your minds. Her whole being is laid bare before you.*
40.context:
CinematicNodeContext: --fade in--
Minthara and the player embrace, naked.
The player's hand drifts over the small of Minthara's back. Minthara grabs it, pulling it under.
--fade out--

25.text: *As your bodies lock together, so do your minds. Her whole being is laid bare before you.*
25.context:
CinematicNodeContext: --fade in--
Minthara holds the player's head close with her right, releasing their grip to move south--the player respondes to the sensation.
The player player dances their finger playfully across Minthara's ear for a moment.
Minthara turns, kissing it before guiding her head down the player's stomach.
The player's hand moves from the ear gently follow Minthara's head down.
--fade out--

55.text: *As your bodies lock together, so do your minds. Her whole being is laid bare before you.*
55.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Minthara leans against player, both dozing against the base of the alter
The player looks down toward Minthara, their eyes snapping open

113.text: *As your bodies lock together, so do your minds. Her whole being is laid bare before you.*
113.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Minthara leans against player, both dozing against the base of the alter
The player looks down toward Minthara, their eyes snapping open

102.speaker: Narrator
102.text: *As your bodies lock together, so do your minds. Her whole being is laid bare before you.*
102.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Minthara leans against player, both dozing against the base of the alter
The player looks down toward Minthara, their eyes snapping open

51.speaker: Narrator
51.text: *And half-hidden at the centre of her desire, you discover something unexpected - fear.*
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge facial expression starts to turn... It's a moment of intimate quiet. There is a very slow fade towards the rage graphic as the dark urge seems to fall further into the thought.... once the fade to red or black is complete, there is just a jarring SNAP sound effect.

108.speaker: Player
108.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge facial expression starts to turn... It's a moment of intimate quiet. There is a very slow fade towards the rage graphic as the dark urge seems to fall further into the thought.... once the fade to red or black is complete, there is just a jarring SNAP sound effect.

94.speaker: Narrator
94.text: *You draw her closer, with all the vim of a lover's first embrace.*
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge facial expression starts to turn... It's a moment of intimate quiet. There is a very slow fade towards the rage graphic as the dark urge seems to fall further into the thought.... once the fade to red or black is complete, there is just a jarring SNAP sound effect.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: Don't let the Urge ruin the moment. Desire. Focus on desire.
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches down, pulling Minthara's face in for a kiss long kiss before releasing it

38.text: I would have you by my side in Menzoberranzan when our work on the surface is done.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player reaches down, pulling Minthara's face in for a kiss long kiss before releasing it

86.text: I would have you by my side in Menzoberranzan when our work on the surface is done.
86.context:
NodeContext: smiling, peaceful. Menzoberranzan ( men-zo-BEAR-an-zon) is her home city

JLatino: I'd like some alt reads for this line that isn't peaceful, where the Absolute has just told her she has to kill the player, so there's a mournful tone to this line.

1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
1.text: I would have you by my side in Menzoberranzan when our work on the surface is done.
1.context:
NodeContext: smiling, peaceful. Menzoberranzan ( men-zo-BEAR-an-zon) is her home city

JLatino: I'd like some alt reads for this line that isn't peaceful, where the Absolute has just told her she has to kill the player, so there's a mournful tone to this line.

70.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
70.text: Speak to me. Tell me what is in your heart.
70.context: NodeContext: spoken softly, but with a slight urgency

54.speaker: Player
54.text: You don't need to ask. Look. Let our minds touch.

72.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
72.text: No. I want the truth. I want to hear it in your voice, not in my mind.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Don't you think your mind shows you the truth?
24.context: NodeContext: puzzled by her own doubts - 'tonight the Absolute was silent' is a scary thought. The voice of god fell silent for her and she's confused and apprehensive

111.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
111.text: The Absolute owns my mind. I cannot remember a time when her voice did not fill it. Except tonight... tonight the Absolute was silent.
111.context: NodeContext: puzzled by her own doubts - 'tonight the Absolute was silent' is a scary thought. The voice of god fell silent for her and she's confused and apprehensive

82.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
82.text: I only heard your breath and your voice.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: I'm glad we did this - I enjoyed it more than the battle.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: There's more to you than I thought.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: I wanted a bit of fun, not a heart-to-heart.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: Passion - I enjoyed that more than the battle.
95.context: NodeContext: puzzled by her own doubts - 'tonight the Absolute was silent' is a scary thought. The voice of god fell silent for her and she's confused and apprehensive

80.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
80.text: As did I. During the battle, my mind raced, my blood burned... I was righteous. But tonight, I only heard your breath and your voice.
80.context: NodeContext: puzzled by her own doubts - 'tonight the Absolute was silent' is a scary thought. The voice of god fell silent for her and she's confused and apprehensive

73.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
73.text: The Absolute was silent, and - strange to say - that brought me comfort.
73.context: NodeContext: this is a scary thought for her - she's very apprehensive, but also curious

42.speaker: Player
42.text: Curiosity - there's more to you than I thought.

12.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
12.text: I could say the same of you. There is something about you that disturbs me.

6.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
6.context: NodeContext: - she's very apprehensive, but also curious

33.speaker: Narrator
33.text: *The artefact pulses softly, sending out a warning. It is afraid.*
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: artefact isn't shown - player receives telepathic signal from it. Light mind-meld moment.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: The Absolute isn't what you think it is.

78.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
78.text: Quiet - if She hears you, She will kill us both. I have felt Her love, but I have also seen Her wrath. Those who turn from Her grace die screaming.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: Then your doubt is a dangerous thing. Push it to one side.
68.context: NodeContext: sad, resigned to not getting answers

62.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
62.context: NodeContext: sad, resigned to not getting answers

100.speaker: Player
100.text: Your question is heresy. You should pray for forgiveness.

21.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
21.text: You are right... but I cannot deny what my heart tells me.

10.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
10.text: So much that has happened since I left the Underdark is like a dream of somebody else's life. I... do not know myself anymore.

4.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
4.text: Perhaps that is what I deserve. I have failed Her. The weapon I seek is nowhere to be found.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: The weapon you sought - I have it. It blocks Her influence.
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Psychic pulse from the artefact - minthara reacts in horrorNodeContext: voice still low, but panicked and horrified

23.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
23.text: If this is a lie, it is a dangerous one. Show me.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Psychic pulse from the artefact - minthara reacts in horrorNodeContext: voice still low, but panicked and horrified

101.speaker: Player
101.text: Open your mind to her. Reveal all that you know about the artefact.
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Psychic pulse from the artefact - minthara reacts in horrorNodeContext: voice still low, but panicked and horrified

56.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
56.text: It screams. It silences the Absolute, and it screams. What is it? What are you?
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Psychic pulse from the artefact - minthara reacts in horrorNodeContext: voice still low, but panicked and horrified

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Not a lie, a test. Your orders are to kill those who have the weapon. Would you kill me?

45.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
45.text: If She told me to, I would. But I do not hear Her... and perhaps that is a sign that you must live.

116.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
116.text: Or a sign that She has abandoned me.

115.speaker: Player
115.text: The Absolute can't reach you while you're with me.

44.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
44.text: This is blasphemy... but so much that has happened since I left the Underdark is like a dream of somebody else's life. I... do not know myself anymore.

114.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
114.text: Except tonight. Tonight, I wanted this - for myself.

27.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
27.text: I must pray, and you must rest. Tomorrow we will have fresh orders.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara turns her back to the player to pray at the altar when she ends the lineNodeContext: resolute - hopes her prayers will fix everything

96.speaker: Player
96.text: Regret - I wanted a bit of fun, not a heart-to-heart.

85.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
85.text: The moment we were alone together, something changed. I felt it, and you must have felt it too.

90.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
90.context: NodeContext: this is a scary thought for her - she's very apprehensive, but also curious

49.speaker: Player
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara flinches in her dozing

93.speaker: Player
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara flinches in her dozing

28.speaker: Narrator
28.text: *She flinches as layers of her psyche peel back, revealing the scars of a life spent anticipating a knife in the back.*
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara flinches in her dozing

37.speaker: Narrator
37.text: *The memories of countless dead, slain too soon - not just enemies, but family, friends, lovers.*
37.context:
InternalNodeContext: Minthara wakes with, aware of the invation, and leans forward cold returning
The player is left in their position

58.context:
InternalNodeContext: Minthara wakes with, aware of the invation, and leans forward cold returning
The player is left in their position

67.context:
InternalNodeContext: Minthara wakes with, aware of the invation, and leans forward cold returning
The player is left in their position

5.speaker: Player
5.context: NodeContext: she turns her face away - she is shocked, shaken even

71.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
71.text: My body could have been yours, but some things are mine alone.
71.context: NodeContext: she turns her face away - she is shocked, shaken even

81.text: My body could have been yours, but some things are mine alone.
81.context: NodeContext: she turns her face away - she is shocked, shaken even

22.text: My body could have been yours, but some things are mine alone.
22.context: NodeContext: she turns her face away - she is shocked, shaken even

109.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
109.text: My body could have been yours, but some things are mine alone.
109.context: NodeContext: she turns her face away - she is shocked, shaken even

63.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
63.text: That was not yours to see.
63.context: NodeContext: she turns her face away - she is shocked, shaken even

7.speaker: Player
7.text: I'm sorry - I meant no harm.

88.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
88.text: You are incapable of harming me. Get out of my sight.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: There's no shame in being afraid.
19.context: NodeContext: weary and as close to friendly advice as she ever gets

36.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
36.text: I harnessed my fear long ago - it sharpens me. You would do well to do the same.
36.context: NodeContext: weary and as close to friendly advice as she ever gets

13.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player stands, departing from the alter area

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Not this. I want to leave.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara, leaning over the player, steps back, irritated, disappointed and the player walks awayNodeContext: irritated - was hoping to seduce us and got turned down

26.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
26.text: Then go - rest. We will discuss our next move in the morning.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Minthara, leaning over the player, steps back, irritated, disappointed and the player walks awayNodeContext: irritated - was hoping to seduce us and got turned down

89.speaker: Player
89.text: This isn't my idea of a good time.

53.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
53.text: Then leave. You would only have disappointed me.
